note.p: Education: Diocesan School, Derby; Owens College, Manchester University; University of Gottingen
Career: Indian Meteorological Department (joined 1906); Director, Meteorological Office (1920)
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1965 vol 11 pp 157-175, plate, by E Gold

References: R Singh and F Riess, 'The nobel laureate Sir Chandrasekhara Venkata Raman FRS and his contacts with the British Scientific community in a social and political context' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 47-64
